text.section: The Department annually shall publish maps and coordinates of oyster sanctuaries, closed oyster harvest reserve areas, and areas closed to shellfish harvest by the Department of the Environment.

section.section: The Department shall provide the publications required under this section to each tidal fish licensee who pays the oyster surcharges required under § 4-701(e) of this title.

Before a person may catch oysters under a tidal fish license that has an oyster authorization and for which the oyster surcharges have been paid, the person shall certify to the Department on a form the Department prescribes that the person received the publications required under this section.
